query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.countryId,
  p.serviceId,
  p.apiId,
  p.ourPrice,
  c.name as countryName,
  c.active as countryActive,
  s.name as serviceName,
  s.active as serviceActive,
  a.name as apiName
FROM prices p
LEFT JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
LEFT JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
LEFT JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
WHERE s.smshubCode = 'wa'
  AND c.active = true
  AND s.active = true
ORDER BY p.apiId;
command:

  p.countryId,
  p.serviceId,
  p.apiId,
  p.ourPrice,
  c.name as countryName,
  c.active as countryActive,
  s.name as serviceName,
  s.active as serviceActive,
  a.name as apiName
FROM prices p
LEFT JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
LEFT JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
LEFT JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
WHERE s.smshubCode = 'wa'
  AND c.active = true
  AND s.active = true
ORDER BY p.apiId;
